game.name: Fever Meme
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This game is a cross between The Stanley Parable, Undertale, and rage games like I Wanna Be the Guy. And the deeper you get, the less the fourth wall is respected. This game is a parody of game design and laughs on the surface, but there is a deeper and darker story to this game's origin to unravel.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This game is a cross between The Stanley Parable, Undertale, and rage games like I Wanna Be the Guy. And the deeper you get, the less the fourth wall is respected. This game is a parody of game design and laughs on the surface, but there is a deeper and darker story to this game's origin to unravel.

reviewHighlights.text: 초보 개발자의 첫 작품으로 나름 재미있다. 하지만 나는 작품에서 사견이나 연재중단이 첨가되는것을 싫어한다. 감정적 호소가 필요해 보이긴 하나, 그것이 게임을 완성시키지 못한데에 대한 정당화가 되지 못한다.
